string-array.name: msg_array
string-array.item: "I love you more than anything!"
"You mean the world to me."
"Exams are getting close. I bet you're gonna pass with flying colours."
"Goofy <3"
"I love you more. Any objections? Yes? What is the name of this application?"
"Harry Potter < Lord Of The Rings"
"Hey gorgeous! <3"
"Hey! I love you <3"
"It's easy. Set a destination and don't stop until you've reached it. You are certainly going to become a writer. I'm sure of it ;)"
"Thank you for being in my life! You are the best thing ever happened to me <3"
"You are adorable. And smart. And beautiful. And sweet. Well.. You are PERFECT."
"Do NOT underestimate yourself. Be proud of who you are. Well, I AM proud of you anyway :)"
"I'm proud of having the privilege of calling you "my girlfriend"."
"Xazouli <3"
"Stravouli <3"
"What is your favorite movie (Harry Potter excluded)? Send me on facebook."
"Thelw na erthei kalokairi!!!"
"Good luck! For no reason :P"
"I try to create sympathy for my characters, then turn the monsters loose. - Stephen King"
"It is our choicesâ€¦ that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities. - J. K. Rowling"
"Anything's possible if you've got enough nerve. - J. K. Rowling"
"All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us. - J. R. R. Tolkien"
"Courage is found in unlikely places. - J. R. R. Tolkien"
"A pen is to me as a beak is to a hen. - J. R. R. Tolkien"
